## TupleValue type

Extract the values of a tuple as a union type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TupleValue<GTuple extends readonly unknown[]> = GTuple[number];
```

## Remarks


```ts
const myTuple = ['a', 'b', 'c'] as const;

type MyTuple = TupleValue<typeof myTuple>; // 'a' | 'b' | 'c'

```
